datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to conservation efforts, climate change, and sustainability.

columns.name: alternative_transport_ratio
columns.description: Percentage of public transportation vehicles using alternative fuels such as electricity or biofuels

columns.name: average_income
columns.description: Average annual income per household in the region

columns.name: population_density_per_sq_km
columns.description: The number of people per square kilometer in the region

columns.name: public_transportation_usage_rate
columns.description: Percentage of the population that regularly uses public transportation

columns.name: percentage_of_college_graduates
columns.description: The percentage of residents with a college degree or higher in the region.

columns.name: renewable_energy_usage_percentile
columns.description: The percentile rank of regions based on the extent of renewable energy usage.

columns.name: regulatory_compliance_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of environmental regulations complied with in a region

columns.name: number_of_environmental_policies
columns.description: Total number of active environmental policies in the region

columns.name: population_density
columns.description: Number of people per square kilometer

columns.name: industry_pollution_level
columns.description: Rating of the pollution level from local industries, scaled 1 (least) to 5 (most).

columns.name: environmental_education_initiatives
columns.description: Number of environmental education programs active per 10,000 population

columns.name: local_pollution_level
columns.description: Average pollution level measured in the region

columns.name: annual_increase_in_activism
columns.description: Percentage increase in environmental activism per year

columns.name: per_capita_green_investment
columns.description: Average investment in green technologies per capita in the region

columns.name: number_of_local_environmental_ngos
columns.description: The number of local non-governmental organizations focused on environmental issues within the region

columns.name: region_type
columns.description: Category of the region as Urban, Suburban, or Rural

columns.name: public_green_space_area
columns.description: Total area of public green spaces in the region (in square kilometers)

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each region

columns.name: environmental_spending_per_capita
columns.description: Amount of money spent by the local government per capita on environmental initiatives annually

columns.name: recycling_rate
columns.description: Percentage of waste that is recycled in the region

columns.name: governance_efficiency_index
columns.description: A score out of 100 indicating the efficiency of local governance

columns.name: pollution_regulation_score
columns.description: Score evaluating the rigidity of local pollution laws and regulations, scaled 1 to 100

columns.name: carbon_tax_implemented
columns.description: Indicates whether a carbon tax has been implemented in the region

columns.name: industry_emissions_percentile
columns.description: Local industries' emissions ranked by percentile compared to national levels

columns.name: local_environmental_organizations
columns.description: Number of environmental organizations active in the region

columns.name: environmental_laws_strictness
columns.description: Rating of the strictness of environmental laws in the region, scaled from 1 (least strict) to 5 (most strict)

columns.name: environmental_NGO_count
columns.description: Number of registered environmental NGOs per 100,000 inhabitants in the region

columns.name: environmental_program_ratio
columns.description: Percentage of educational programs that are focused on environmental issues

columns.name: environmental_protest_frequency
columns.description: The average number of environmental protests per year in the region.

columns.name: level_of_environmental_awareness
columns.description: Rating of environmental awareness on a scale from 1 to 10

columns.name: plastic_consumption_change
columns.description: Percentage change in single-use plastic consumption over a 5-year period

columns.name: predicted_plastic_reduction
columns.description: Expected decrease in single-use plastic consumption based on a specific calculation

columns.name: carbon_tax_last_year
columns.description: Indicates whether a carbon tax was introduced in the region in the last year

columns.name: recycling_program_participation
columns.description: The percentage of households participating in local recycling programs.

columns.name: commercial_area
columns.description: Total area of commercial spaces in the region (in square kilometers)

queries.question: Is there a relationship between the region_id and the local pollution level across different regions?
queries.true_hypothesis: The region_id is calculated as 100 times the square root of the square of the regulatory compliance percentage plus the cube of the number of local environmental organizations, added to 10 times the binary indicator based on the per capita green investment exceeding a certain threshold.
